entry.title: New Arrivals ! HP zBook, HP Elite X2, HP EliteBook Series, Apple iMac Pro
entry.content:
Are you a tech enthusiast always on the lookout for the latest gadgets? Well, we have some exciting news for you! These new arrivals of HP zBook, HP Elite X2, HP EliteBook Series, and Apple iMac Pro is just the best choice for you. These cutting-edge devices are packed with innovative features that will take your productivity and creativity to new heights.

So, whether you're a creative professional, a business traveler, or a Mac enthusiast, these new arrivals have something to offer for everyone. Upgrade your tech arsenal with the HP zBook, HP Elite X2, HP EliteBook Series, or Apple iMac Pro, and experience the next level of productivity and performance. Stay ahead of the curve and embrace the future of technology!

Let's dive into the details and explore what makes these new arrivals so special.

 

 

HP 348 G4 -7th Gen. Intel Core i5 - 256GB SSD - 8GB RAM - 4GB Total Graphics - HDMI
₦170,000

  • Model : 348 G4
  • Type : Notebook
  • Processor : Intel Core i5-7200U @ 2.50GHz 2.71GHz
  • Storage Capacity : 256GB SSD
  • Maximum Storage Capacity : 2TB HDD / 1TB SSD
  • RAM : 8GB
  • Maximum RAM Upgrade : 32GB
  • Supported OS : Windows 10 and 11
  • Battery health : Excellent
  • Minimum battery backup : 2 hours
  • Maximum battery backup : Depends on usage

    HP Elite X2 1012 G2 7th Gen. Intel Core i5 - 256GB SSD - 8GB RAM - 4GB Total Graphics - Keypad Light - Touchscreen
    ₦245,000.00

    Looking for a device that can adapt to your ever-changing needs? Look no further than the HP Elite X2. This 2-in-1 laptop/tablet hybrid offers the best of both worlds. Its detachable keyboard and touch-enabled display give you the flexibility to switch between laptop and tablet mode effortlessly. Plus, with its long battery life and powerful performance, you can stay productive all day long.

entry.title: New Shipment Alert ! Dell Chromebook 11 - ₦25,000 Limited Offer
entry.content:
We have just received the Dell Chromebook 11 in stock. It's a unique laptop computer with amazing features for work, study and play.

Trust me, you wouldn't want to miss this amazing game changer.

 

 

What is the Dell Chromebook 11?

The Dell Chromebook 11 is a cutting-edge laptop designed for productivity and efficiency. It combines the power of Dell's hardware with the simplicity and speed of Chrome OS, making it an ideal choice for both students and professionals.

 

Why is the Dell Chromebook 11 a Game Changer?

With its sleek design and impressive features, the Dell Chromebook 11 is revolutionising the way we work and learn. Here are some key reasons why it's a game changer:

1. Lightning-Fast Performance

The Dell Chromebook 11 is powered by Intel processors, ensuring smooth and lag-free performance. Whether you're multitasking or running resource-intensive applications, this laptop can handle it all with ease.

 

2. Seamless Integration with Google Apps

As a Chromebook, the Dell Chromebook 11 seamlessly integrates with Google's suite of productivity apps. From Google Docs to Google Drive, you'll have access to all the tools you need to collaborate and create.

 

3. Long Battery Life

One of the standout features of the Dell Chromebook 11 is its impressive battery life. With up to 10 hours of usage on a single charge, you can work or study without worrying about running out of power.

4. Robust Security

Chrome OS is known for its robust security features, and the Dell Chromebook 11 is no exception. With built-in virus protection and automatic updates, you can browse the web and download files with peace of mind.

 

5. Portable and Lightweight

Whether you're constantly on the go or need a laptop for your daily commute, the Dell Chromebook 11 is the perfect companion. Weighing just under 3 pounds, it's incredibly lightweight and easy to carry around.

 

Conclusion

The Dell Chromebook 11 is a game-changing laptop that offers lightning-fast performance, seamless integration with Google apps, long battery life, robust security, and portability. Whether you're a student or a professional, this laptop is sure to enhance your productivity and make your life easier. Don't miss out on this new stock alert – get your Dell Chromebook 11 today!
